title: #92Noon! Russo Radio! - Lapanta/Smith/Guerin/Walsh/Friedman
description: --Russo Radio is in for PA! Anthony Lapanta checks in, Joe Smith talks Tampa Bay Lightning in their series, Wild GM Bill Guerin talks all things Wild and his offseason so far, Todd Walsh reflects on his friend Tom Kurvers passing away, and Elliotte Friedman talks Jack Eichel and more.
itunes:summary: --Russo Radio is in for PA! Anthony Lapanta checks in, Joe Smith talks Tampa Bay Lightning in their series, Wild GM Bill Guerin talks all things Wild and his offseason so far, Todd Walsh reflects on his friend Tom Kurvers passing away, and Elliotte Friedman talks Jack Eichel and more.
